{"id":501722141,"question_id":695,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"3 years, 9 months","timestamp":1622612566,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"156 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/501722141/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"16.9 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def maxAreaOfIsland(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        rows, cols = len(grid), len(grid[0])\n        max_area = 0\n        \n        visited = [[0 for j in range(cols)] for i in range(rows)]\n        \n        def dfs(i, j):\n            nonlocal rows, cols\n            if i < 0 or i >= rows or j < 0 or j >= cols or visited[i][j] or not grid[i][j]:\n                return 0\n            visited[i][j] = 1\n            area = 0\n            return 1 + dfs(i,j-1) + dfs(i,j+1) + dfs(i-1,j) + dfs(i+1,j)\n        \n        for i in range(rows):\n            for j in range(cols):\n                if grid[i][j]:\n                    max_area = max(max_area, dfs(i, j))\n        return max_area","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
